movie.title: 3 Lives
movie.description_intro: A woman on the run from ruthless kidnappers discovers her rescuer is the man jailed for attacking her 15 years earlier.
movie.description_full: A woman on the run from ruthless kidnappers discovers her rescuer is the man jailed for attacking her 15 years earlier.

movies.title: Unfriended
movies.summary: While video chatting one night, six high school friends receive a Skype message from a classmate who killed herself exactly one year ago. At first they think it's a prank, but when the girl starts revealing the friends' darkest secrets, they realize they are dealing with something out of this world, something that wants them dead.
movies.description_full: While video chatting one night, six high school friends receive a Skype message from a classmate who killed herself exactly one year ago. At first they think it's a prank, but when the girl starts revealing the friends' darkest secrets, they realize they are dealing with something out of this world, something that wants them dead.

movies.title: A Go! Go! Cory Carson Christmas
movies.title_english: A Go! Go! Cory Carson Christmas
movies.title_long: A Go! Go! Cory Carson Christmas (2020)
movies.summary: When a familiar stranger shows up with no memory, Cory saves Christmas for everyone by helping him remember the magic of Christmas.
movies.description_full: When a familiar stranger shows up with no memory, Cory saves Christmas for everyone by helping him remember the magic of Christmas.
movies.synopsis: When a familiar stranger shows up with no memory, Cory saves Christmas for everyone by helping him remember the magic of Christmas.

movies.title: The Engagement Clause
movies.summary: A high level executive must find herself a husband before Christmas in order to inherit a fortune.
movies.description_full: A high level executive must find herself a husband before Christmas in order to inherit a fortune.
movies.synopsis: A high level executive must find herself a husband before Christmas in order to inherit a fortune.

movies.title: Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves
movies.summary: After being captured by Turks during the Crusades, Robin of Locksley and a Moor, Azeem, escape back to England, where Azeem vows to remain until he repays Robin for saving his life. Meanwhile, Robin's father, a nobleman loyal to King Richard the Lionheart, has been murdered by the brutal Sheriff of Nottingham, who helped install Richard's treacherous brother, Prince John, as King while Richard is overseas fighting the Crusades. When Robin returns home, he vows to avenge his father's death and restore Richard to the throne. Even though Maid Marian, his childhood friend, cannot help him, he escapes to the Forest of Sherwood where he joins a band of exiled villagers and becomes their leader. With their help, he attempts to cleanse the land of the evil that the Sheriff has spread.
